name: Rename Post Labels by WOWDevShop
author: XicoOfficial

sections.description:
Customizing Default Post Labels

“Renamem Post Labels by WOWDevShop” is a clean and easy-to-use plugin that let’s you rename and customize the default post labels and icon for the admin panel.

Support

Looking for a helping hand? View plugin documentation.

Get Involved

Looking to contribute code to this plugin? Go ahead and fork the repository over at GitHub.
(submit pull requests to the latest “release-” tag)

Usage

To change the icon and customize the default post labels use the following steps:

  1. Go to Settings > Rename Default Post Labels
  2. Write you custom Labels.
  3. Save your changes.
sections.installation:
Installing “Rename Post Labels by WOWDevshop” can be done either by searching for “Rename Post Labels by WOWDevShop” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the “Plugins > Add New > Upload” screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing “Rename Post Labels by WOWDevshop” can be done either by searching for “Rename Post Labels by WOWDevShop” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the “Plugins > Add New > Upload” screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How do I contribute?

We encourage everyone to contribute their ideas, thoughts and code snippets. This can be done by forking the repository over at GitHub.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Tested compatibility with WordPress 4.9
  • Remove deprecated function screen_icon();

1.1.2

  • Tested compatibility with WordPress 4.6

1.1.1

  • Add function to load text domain translations

1.1.0

  • Plugin internationalized
  • Ready for 4.5

short_description: This plugin let's you change the default labels of the post type and customize the icon.
